section.header: commission implementing decision of 10.8.2022 relating to the designation of "gold" as an orphan medicinal product under regulation (ec) no 141/2000 of the european parliament and of the council
section.p: (text with eea relevance) (only the dutch text is authentic) the european commission, having regard to the treaty on the functioning of the european union, having regard to regulation (ec) no 141/2000 of the european parliament and of the council of 16 december 1999 on orphan medicinal products 1, and in particular the first sentence of article 5(8) thereof, having regard to the application submitted by clene netherlands b.v. on 17 may 2022 under article 5(1) of regulation (ec) no 141/2000, having regard to the favourable opinion of the european medicines agency, drawn up on 14 july 2022 by the committee for orphan medicinal products and received by the commission on 22 july 2022, whereas: (1) the application submitted by clene netherlands b.v. concerning the medicinal product “gold” was validated on 14 june 2022 under article 5(4) of regulation (ec) no 141/2000. (2) "gold" meets the designation criteria referred to in article 3(1) of regulation (ec) no 141/2000. (3) the application should therefore be accepted, has adopted this decision: article 1 the medicinal product “gold” is designated as an orphan medicinal product for the indication: treatment of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis. it shall be entered in the community register of orphan medicinal products under number eu/3/22/2686. article 2 the european medicines agency shall make available to all interested parties the opinion of the committee on orphan medicinal products referred to in this decision.
article 3 this decision is addressed to clene netherlands b.v., strawinskylaan 411, 1077 xx amsterdam, noord-holland, nederland. done at brussels, 10.8.2022
